00018     {
00019         if ( OutputString )

00030 namespace Omiscid {
00031     Mutex TrackingMemoryLocker;
00032     unsigned int NumberOfTrackingMemoryClient = 0;
00033 }    // namespace Omiscid
00034
00035 TrackMemoryLeaks::TrackMemoryLeaks()
00036 {
00037     TrackingMemoryLocker.EnterMutex();
00038     NumberOfTrackingMemoryClient++;
00039     TrackingMemoryLocker.LeaveMutex();
00040 }
00041
00042 TrackMemoryLeaks::~TrackMemoryLeaks()
00043 {
00044     TrackingMemoryLocker.EnterMutex();
00045     NumberOfTrackingMemoryClient--;
00046     TrackingMemoryLocker.LeaveMutex();
00047
00048     // Dump unfreed will lock data...
00049     DumpUnfreed();
00050 }

00070 struct SimpleMemoryElement
00071 {
00073     void*    Where;            // Given pointer returned by new
00074     size_t    Size;            // Original size of block
00075      struct SimpleMemoryElement * NextElement;
00076 };

00203 MemoryList::MemoryList()
00204 {
00205     // There is nothing in the list
00206     NumberOfElements = 0;
00207     Head = NULL;
00208     Tail = NULL;
00209
00210     // There is no position at all
00211     PreviousElement = NULL;
00212     CurrentElement = NULL;
00213     RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00214 }

00221 // Access fonction
00222 bool MemoryList::Add( size_t SizeOfBlock )
00223 {
00224     struct SimpleMemoryElement * tmp = GetNewSimpleListElement(SizeOfBlock);
00225     if ( tmp == NULL )
00226     {
00227         return false;
00228     }
00229
00230     if ( Head == NULL ) // La liste etait vide
00231     {
00232         Tail =    Head = tmp;
00233     }
00234     else
00235     {
00236         // Le nouveau devient le dernier
00237         Tail->NextElement = tmp;
00238         Tail = tmp;
00239
00240         //if ( Head->NextElement == NULL )
00241         //{
00242         //    Head->NextElement = tmp;
00243         //}
00244     }
00245
00246     // On incremente le nombre d'objet dans la liste
00247     NumberOfElements++;
00248
00249     // Tout est ok
00250     return true;
00251 }
00252
00257 bool MemoryList::AddHead( size_t SizeOfBlock )
00258 {
00259     struct SimpleMemoryElement * tmp = GetNewSimpleListElement(SizeOfBlock);
00260     if ( tmp == NULL )
00261     {
00262         return false;
00263     }
00264
00265     if ( Head == NULL ) // La liste etait vide
00266     {
00267         Tail =    Head = tmp;
00268     }
00269     else
00270     {
00271         // Le nouveau devient le dernier
00272         // Head->NextElement = tmp;
00273         tmp->NextElement = Head;
00274         Head = tmp;
00275     }
00276
00277     // On incremente le nombre d'objet dans la liste
00278     NumberOfElements++;
00279
00280     // Tout est ok
00281     return true;
00282 }
00283
00288 bool MemoryList::AddTail( size_t SizeOfBlock )
00289 {
00290     // just call the add function
00291     return Add(SizeOfBlock);
00292 }

00294 unsigned int MemoryList::GetNumberOfElements() const
00295 {
00296     return NumberOfElements;

00299 // Set position to the first element
00300 void MemoryList::First()
00301 {
00302     PreviousElement = NULL;
00303     CurrentElement = Head;
00304     RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00305 }
00306
00307 // Set position to the next element
00308 bool MemoryList::Next()
00309 {
00310     // Ok, we do not have any other element
00311     if ( CurrentElement == NULL ){
00312         RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00313         return false;
00314     }
00315
00316     //seb
00317     if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured)
00318     {
00319         RemoveCurrentHasOccured = false;
00320         // Previous and Current have already the good value
00321         return true;
00322     }
00323
00324     // Here we can go forward in the list
00325     PreviousElement = CurrentElement;
00326     CurrentElement  = CurrentElement->NextElement;
00327
00328     // Have we reach the end of the list ?
00329     if ( CurrentElement == NULL )
00330     {
00331         return false;
00332     }
00333
00334     return true;
00335 }
00336
00337 // Set position to the next element
00338 bool MemoryList::AtEnd() const
00339 {
00340     // Ok, we do not have any other element
00341     if ( CurrentElement == NULL )
00342         return true;
00343
00344     return false;
00345 }
00346
00347 // Set position to the next element
00348 bool MemoryList::NotAtEnd() const
00349 {
00350     // Ok, we do not have any other element
00351     if ( CurrentElement != NULL )
00352         return true;
00353
00354     return false;
00355 }
00356
00357 // Get the current element of the list
00358 struct SimpleMemoryElement * MemoryList::GetCurrent() const
00359 {
00360     if ( RemoveCurrentHasOccured )
00361         throw  "RemoveCurrentHasOccured";
00362
00363     return CurrentElement;
00364 }
00365
00366 // Remove the current element
00367 bool MemoryList::RemoveCurrent()
00368 {
00369     if(RemoveCurrentHasOccured)
00370         throw  "RemoveCurrentHasOccured";
00371
00372     RemoveCurrentHasOccured = true;
00373     struct SimpleMemoryElement * tmp = CurrentElement;
00374
00375     if ( tmp == NULL )
00376     {
00377         // We must call at least First on a non empty list
00378         return false;
00379     }
00380
00381     // Here we have a current element...
00382     // Are we at the begining of the MemoryList ?
00383     if ( Head == tmp )
00384     {
00385         // Yes, wa are !
00386         Head = tmp->NextElement;
00387
00388         // PreviousElement remains the same :
00389         // PreviousElement == NULL
00390
00391         // The new current element if the next in the list, so the head
00392         CurrentElement = Head;
00393     }
00394     else
00395     {
00396         // We are not at the begining of the list
00397         // Here we can remove directly the element within the list
00398         tmp = CurrentElement;
00399         PreviousElement->NextElement = tmp->NextElement;
00400         CurrentElement = tmp->NextElement;
00401     }
00402
00403     // Was the element the last item of the list ?
00404     if ( Tail == tmp )
00405     {
00406         // We have remove the last item of the list
00407         Tail = PreviousElement;
00408     }
00409
00410     // free the old current element
00411     ReleaseSimpleListElement(tmp);
00412
00413     // Change the element count
00414     NumberOfElements--;
00415
00416     return true;
00417 }
00418
00419 // Remove a specific element
00420 bool MemoryList::Remove(void * LegalPointer)
00421 {
00422     char * Element = (char*)LegalPointer;
00423
00424     for( First(); NotAtEnd(); Next() )
00425     {
00426         if ( GetCurrent()->Where == Element )
00427         {
00428             RemoveCurrent();
00429             return true;
00430         }
00431     }
00432     return false;
00433 }
00434
00435 struct SimpleMemoryElement* MemoryList::GetNewSimpleListElement(size_t SizeOfBlock) const
00436 {
00437     // Allocate the asked size + the size of our structure
00438     struct SimpleMemoryElement * tmp = (struct SimpleMemoryElement*)malloc(SizeOfBlock+sizeof(struct SimpleMemoryElement));
00439
00440     if ( tmp != NULL )
00441     {
00442         tmp->Where = (((char*)tmp)+sizeof(struct SimpleMemoryElement));
00443         tmp->Size = SizeOfBlock;
00444         tmp->NextElement = NULL;
00445     }
00446
00447     return tmp;
00448 }
00449
00450 void MemoryList::ReleaseSimpleListElement(struct SimpleMemoryElement* elt) const
00451 {
00452     if ( elt )
00453     {
00454         free(elt);
00455     }
00456 }
00457
00458 void MemoryList::Empty()
00459 {
00460     struct SimpleMemoryElement * tmp;
00461     // On libere tous les elements de la liste
00462     while( Head != NULL )
00463     {
00464         tmp = Head;
00465         Head = Head->NextElement; // On dechaine le premier element
00466         ReleaseSimpleListElement(tmp);
00467         NumberOfElements--; // Non obligatoire !
00468     }
00469 }
00470
00471 bool MemoryList::IsEmpty() const
00472 { return Head == NULL; }
00473
00474 bool MemoryList::IsNotEmpty() const
00475 { return Head != NULL; }
00476
00477 struct SimpleMemoryElement * MemoryList::ExtractFirst()
00478 {
00479   if(IsEmpty())
00480     throw "MemoryList::ExtractFirst : Forbidden when the list is empty";
00481
00482   struct SimpleMemoryElement * elt = Head;
00483   if(Head == Tail)
00484     {
00485       Head = NULL; Tail = NULL;
00486     }else{
00487       Head = elt->NextElement;
00488     }
00489   NumberOfElements--;
00490
00491   return elt;
00492 }

00497 typedef enum TrackMemoryValues
00498 {
00499     TemporaryBufferSize = 4*1024-1    // 4 Kb - 1 byte
00500 };

00561
00562 void Omiscid::AddMemoryBlock( size_t aSize, void** addr)
00563 {
00564     TrackingMemoryLocker.EnterMutex();
00565     if ( NumberOfTrackingMemoryClient != 0 )
00566     {
00567         // Add head
00568         if ( AllocList.AddTail( aSize ) )
00569         {
00570             *addr = AllocList.Tail->Where;
00571         }
00572     }
00573     else
00574     {
00575         *addr = malloc(aSize);
00576     }
00577     TrackingMemoryLocker.LeaveMutex();
00578 }
00579
00580 void Omiscid::RemoveMemoryBlock(void* addr)
00581 {
00582     TrackingMemoryLocker.EnterMutex();
00583     if ( NumberOfTrackingMemoryClient == 0 )
00584     {
00585         TrackingMemoryLocker.LeaveMutex();
00586         return;
00587     }
00588
00589     if ( AllocList.Remove(addr) == false )
00590     {
00591         free(addr);
00592     }
00593     TrackingMemoryLocker.LeaveMutex();
00594 }
00595
00596 static char * Omiscid::PrintSize( unsigned int SizeOfData )
00597 {
00598     if ( SizeOfData < 1024 )
00599     {
00600         snprintf(WriteSizeBuffer, TemporaryBufferSize, "%d bytes", SizeOfData);
00601     }
00602     else if ( SizeOfData < 1024*1024 )
00603     {
00604         snprintf(WriteSizeBuffer, TemporaryBufferSize, "%.2f Kbytes", (float)SizeOfData/1024.0f);
00605     }
00606     else if ( SizeOfData < 1024*1024*1024 )
00607     {
00608         snprintf(WriteSizeBuffer, TemporaryBufferSize, "%.2f Mbytes", (float)SizeOfData/(1024.0f*1024.0f));
00609     }
00610     else // totalSize >= 1024*1024*1024*1024
00611     {
00612         snprintf(WriteSizeBuffer, TemporaryBufferSize, "%.2f Gbytes", (float)SizeOfData/(1024.0f*1024.0f*1024.0f));
00613     }
00614
00615     return WriteSizeBuffer;
00616 }
00617
00618 void TrackMemoryLeaks::DumpUnfreed()
00619 {
00620     unsigned int TotalSize = 0;
00621     unsigned int NbBlocks = 0;
00622     char buf[TemporaryBufferSize+1];
00623
00624     TrackingMemoryLocker.EnterMutex();
00625
00626     if ( AllocList.GetNumberOfElements() == 0 )
00627     {
00628         TrackingMemoryLocker.LeaveMutex();
00629         return;
00630     }
00631
00632     snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+\n" );
00633     OutputDebugString(buf);
00634
00635     struct SimpleMemoryElement * pTmp;
00636
00637     for( AllocList.First(); AllocList.NotAtEnd(); AllocList.Next() )
00638     {
00639         NbBlocks++;
00640
00641         pTmp = AllocList.GetCurrent();
00642
00643         // Visual studio compliant output (you can click on it to see the rigth line
00644         snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "%s unfreed memory at address %p\n", PrintSize((unsigned int)pTmp->Size), pTmp->Where );
00645         OutputDebugString(buf);
00646
00647         void * tmpv = pTmp->Where;
00648         char * tmpc = (char*)tmpv;
00649         int lSize = (int)pTmp->Size;
00650         int j;
00651         for( j = 0; j < lSize && j < 20; j++)
00652         {
00653             snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "%2.2X ", tmpc[j] & 0x000000ff );
00654             OutputDebugString(buf);
00655         }
00656         for( ; j < 20; j++)
00657         {
00658             snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "   " );
00659             OutputDebugString(buf);
00660         }
00661
00662         for( j = 0; j < lSize && j < 20; j++)
00663         {
00664             if ( tmpc[j] >= 32 && tmpc[j] <= 126 )
00665             {
00666                 snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "%c", tmpc[j] );
00667             }
00668             else
00669             {
00670                 snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "." );
00671             }
00672             OutputDebugString(buf);
00673         }
00674
00675         snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "\n" );
00676         OutputDebugString(buf);
00677
00678         TotalSize += (unsigned int)lSize;
00679     }
00680
00681     snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+\n" );
00682     OutputDebugString(buf);
00683
00684     snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "Total memory unfreed %s (%u allocated block%s).\n", PrintSize(TotalSize), NbBlocks, NbBlocks == 1 ? "" : "s" );
00685     OutputDebugString(buf);
00686
00687     snprintf(buf, TemporaryBufferSize+1, "-+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+\n" );
00688     OutputDebugString(buf);
00689
00690     // Free the memory
00691     for( AllocList.First(); AllocList.NotAtEnd(); AllocList.Next() )
00692     {
00693         AllocList.RemoveCurrent();
00694     }
00695
00696     TrackingMemoryLocker.LeaveMutex();
00697 }
